name: FootballQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open football quiz”
”Alexa, start football quiz”
”Alexa, launch football quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: football quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Football Quiz" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general football knowledge.

Users are asked general football questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.

In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Try the multiplayer mode, challenge your family and friends and find out who will be the winner!!! 

Have fun!
